name: Flappy Beast
description:
It was "flapping" around, and everybody was having so much fun!

But you know how the death comes. Yeah, it comes when you never expect. Thats what they say.

What nobody knows, is that the fun is so much better after the death!

That's what you gonna find out playing with us! You can fly, flap, and have fun for all the eternity!
Join us and lets play!
